full_summary:
### Temporary Help Services Requirement
#### Tender Announcement
The Government of Canada is seeking qualified suppliers to provide Temporary Help Services to Employment and Social Development Canada (ESDC) under a contract that will commence on [July 15, 2024, and conclude on March 28, 2025]. This Contract will be awarded to the supplier who submits the lowest price that meets the requirements outlined below.

**Notices**
Procurement: Invitation to Tender and Request for Proposal
Contracting Authority: Employment and Social Development Canada

**Tender Details**
* Contract Number: 100026556
* Procurement Category: SRV (Services)
* Award Process: Competitive - Selective tendering
* Date of Publication: June 21, 2024
* Tender Closing Date: June 28, 2024, at 2:00 PM Eastern Time
* Contract Start Date: July 15, 2024
* Contract End Date: March 28, 2025
* Estimated Contract Period: 179 days

**Requirement**
* This contract requires suppliers to provide Temporary Help Services to ESDC in the National Capital Region (NCR)
* Suppliers must meet the requirements specified in the solicitation document, available on the [Canada's Tenders website](https://buyandsell.gc.ca/en/procurement eternity_of_service)
* The Temporary Help Services Method of Supply is subject to quarterly refresh cycles

**Important Documents**
* Request for Proposal (RFP) - [Download the RFP Document](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/40868/100026556-npp_amd_en.pdf)

**Supplier Eligibility**
* Suppliers must be qualified under the streams and categories listed above to participate in this tender
* Suppliers must meet the requirements outlined in the Request for Proposal (RFP) document

**Language of Preference**
* The Government of Canada will accept proposals written in either of Canada's official languages, English or French, provided that otherwise compliant bids are submitted

**Submission Guidelines**
* Bids must be submitted by June 28, 2024, at 2:00 PM Eastern Time
* Suppliers are invited to contact:* Natasha Heath* Email: nc-solicitations-gd@hrsdc-rhdcc.gc.ca 
Please direct any questions or concerns to this contact.

### Tentative List of Authorized Contractors

A full list of Authorized Contractors is available in the Solicitation Document.
